title: Random Freezing for 20-30 Seconds
body:
Hello, recently since patch 5.17, ive been getting a number of random freezes. Am I the only one experiencing these annoying occurrences? Please discuss, I'd like too fix this problem as soon as possible. 

Sincerly, Edday

replies.body:
I actually got this really creepy bug in botlane where my game froze and then yasuo randomly appeared dashing through the minions and he disappeared......

Then the game resumed and he was mid O.o

ive been getting it during the game too. yesterday or 2 days ago a bunch of people who were with iinet had massive problems with the league client. it was actually sorted pretty quickly but if those with this problem are with iinet too maybe they need to fix that too
Yeah I'm getting this to. I find it can happen randomly with no prediction.  Once it even booted me to the point i restarted my computer
lol i am getting this from 5.16 patch lol random freezing for some weird reason
When? During the game at random intervals? Or during certain stages of the game, specific events, anything else would be nice to know?
